title: I Don't Know Who To Buy
body:
I was hoping people could help me out. I have enough IP to buy any 1 champion, but i don't know who.
Lately I have been calling fill, but i want my next champ to be a jungler.
I am not a kiting jungler, i tank the camps and try to out sustain them. 
So I've mainly used {{champion:19}} , {{champion:77}}, {{champion:2}}, & {{champion:11}} .
But i just want to try something new. 
Help make my decision easier :P

replies.body: for jg {{summoner:11}} honestly, i recommend **fiddlesticks** {{champion:9}} , fun to learn :) or **vi **{{champion:254}} /**lee-sin** {{champion:64}}  if youre up for a more difficult champ to master... great for ganks

As an ex-Warwick main, I have to say that Aatrox stood out as my next choice. His sustain and build path is fairly similar to warwick, but has the bonus of more cc/escape tools. In the current jungle meta, Sated: Devourer Aatrox is broken, especially when combined with AP Nashor's Tooth Aatrox. I used to play it regularly, before I went through my support phase through to top lane.

Firstly, will just say this is in the wrong topic thread. Should be in Gameplay and Strat.

That aside, I learnt how to jungle on one champ, and I recommend him whenever I can. I see you like tanky champs, so he might be perfect for you.

{{champion:31}} - Cho'gath.

Yep, the nightmare from beyond. One of the best tanks in game, and with {{summoner:11}}, and his Ultimate Feast, it's like having 2 smites in hand at all times. You'll ALWAYS get dragon. Get his E to level 4, while also maxing out Q, is how I max him.

Get {{item:3709}} to become pretty much the biggest tank in game at Max R; {{item:3027}} for the only damage you'll ever need plus extras (your Ult deals true damage, so all you have to do in fights is pick off low health carries), {{item:3065}} for the self heal regen from your passive, {{item:1326}} for speed if you need to get around feasting up your stacks should you die. And boom, you'll go 8/1/10 consistently. If you add some more AP and magic pen for you last two items, then you can easily go 15/1/10 ever time.

He clears well, deals amazing damage, is tanky as heck, split pushes like a bawss, and he's pretty cool to look at. And if you wanna go more tank you can, ad, you can, or more ap, you can too. Such a versatile, cool champ.
I have olaf, he is a beast

Aatrox and Nocturne although i wouldn't recommend jungle Aatrox because he doesn't have a good clear and his ganks aren't really good because the Q knockup is a little slow. Kayle might work for you because kayle have a W to heal herself when clearing the jungle.  Zac might work too although i have never tried to jungle with him yet. Xin Zhao have quite a good sustain too.

Hecarim for sure! {{champion:120}} ^^
Edit: Or maybs {{champion:56}}. Those are my 2 votes.
